headline: U.S. Majors Cash In as Permian Dominance Widens the Oil Gap
summary: ExxonMobil and Chevron are winning the upstream game thanks to their dominant, low-cost positions in the Permian Basin.

headline: Block Inc. (XYZ) Jumps 7% on S&P 500 Inclusion
summary: We recently published 10 Resilient Stocks Defying Market Sentiment. Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is one of Monday’s biggest gainers. Block Inc. rallied for a fourth straight day on Monday, adding 7.22 percent to close at $78.08 apiece as investor sentiment was bolstered by its inclusion in the S&P 500 index. Effective Wednesday, July 23, Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) will begin […]

headline: Why Chevron Is Scaling Back Its Permian Footprint
summary: Chevron is nearing peak production in the Permian Basin and is strategically shifting its focus from growth to generating billions in free cash flow, aiming to sustain its output through 2040.

raw.headline: Why Chevron Is Scaling Back Its Permian Footprint

headline: Energy Transition Today - Coal's Surprising Resilience Amid Global Energy Shifts
summary: The recent Wood Mackenzie Horizons report underscores evolving dynamics in global energy transition, highlighting the potential for extended reliance on coal despite ongoing shifts towards renewables. The report suggests that factors such as energy security concerns, burgeoning power demand, and technological advancements could sustain coal demand, potentially delaying its phase-out beyond 2030. This has significant implications for the global energy transition, as the anticipated decline in...

headline: Is Chevron (CVX) a Good Long-Term Stock for Halal Portfolios?
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is included among the 11 Best Halal Dividend Stocks to Buy Now.
